com.nestlabs.sdk

Class ThermostatSetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nestlabs.sdk.ThermostatSetter

  • public final class ThermostatSetter
extends Object
    ThermostatSetter provides methods for setting values on Thermostats.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setFanTimerActive(String thermostatId, boolean isActive)
      Sets whether the fan timer is engaged; used with fanTimerTimeout to turn on the fan for a (user-specified) preset duration.
      void setFanTimerActive(String thermostatId, boolean isActive, Callback callback)
      Sets whether the fan timer is engaged; used with fanTimerTimeout to turn on the fan for a (user-specified) preset duration.

      Sets the HVAC system heating/cooling modes.
      void setHVACMode(String thermostatId, String mode, Callback callback)
      Sets the HVAC system heating/cooling modes.
      void setTargetTemperatureC(String thermostatId, double temperature)
      Sets the desired temperature, in half degrees Celsius (0.5°C).

      Sets the desired temperature, in half degrees Celsius (0.5°C).

      Sets the desired temperature, in full degrees Fahrenheit (1°F).

    • Method Detail

      • setTargetTemperatureF

        public void setTargetTemperatureF(String thermostatId,
                                  long temperature,
                                  Callback callback)
        Sets the desired temperature, in full degrees Fahrenheit (1°F). Used when hvac_mode = "heat" or "cool".
        Parameters:
        thermostatId - The unique identifier for the Thermostat.
        temperature - The desired temperature in full degrees Fahrenheit.
        callback - A Callback to receive whether the change was successful.

      • setTargetTemperatureF

      • setHVACMode

        public void setHVACMode(String thermostatId,
                        String mode,
                        Callback callback)
        Sets the HVAC system heating/cooling modes. For systems with both heating and cooling capability, set this value to "heat-cool" (Heat / Cool mode) to get the best experience.
        Parameters:
        thermostatId - The unique identifier for the Thermostat.
        mode - The heating/cooling mode. Values can be "heat", "cool", "heat-cool", or "off".
        callback - A Callback to receive whether the change was successful.

      • setHVACMode

        public void setHVACMode(String thermostatId,
                        String mode)
        Sets the HVAC system heating/cooling modes. For systems with both heating and cooling capability, set this value to "heat-cool" (Heat / Cool mode) to get the best experience.
        Parameters:
        thermostatId - The unique identifier for the Thermostat.
        mode - The heating/cooling mode. Values can be "heat", "cool", "heat-cool", or "off".

      • setFanTimerActive

        public void setFanTimerActive(String thermostatId,
                              boolean isActive,
                              Callback callback)
        Sets whether the fan timer is engaged; used with fanTimerTimeout to turn on the fan for a (user-specified) preset duration.
        Parameters:
        thermostatId - The unique identifier for the Thermostat.
        isActive - true if the fan timer is to be engaged, false if the fan timer should be disengaged.
        callback - A Callback to receive whether the change was successful.

      • setFanTimerActive

        public void setFanTimerActive(String thermostatId,
                              boolean isActive)
        Sets whether the fan timer is engaged; used with fanTimerTimeout to turn on the fan for a (user-specified) preset duration.
        Parameters:
        thermostatId - The unique identifier for the Thermostat.
        isActive - true if the fan timer is to be engaged, false if the fan timer should be disengaged.
